name: Samsung 4K Smart TV
description: Experience stunning visuals with the Samsung 4K Smart TV. It offers a large display and smart features for seamless streaming.

name: KitchenAid Stand Mixer
description: Create culinary masterpieces with the KitchenAid Stand Mixer. It comes with various attachments and a powerful motor.

name: Outdoor Camping Tent
description: Enjoy the great outdoors with this spacious and durable camping tent. It offers easy setup and weather resistance.

name: Fitbit Versa 3
description: Track your fitness goals with the Fitbit Versa 3. It features heart rate monitoring, built-in GPS, and a variety of workout modes.

name: Leather Crossbody Bag
description: Carry your essentials in style with this chic leather crossbody bag. It offers multiple compartments and an adjustable strap.
